title: Interstate and foreign commerce and maritime employment
context: ยง386-7 Interstate and foreign commerce and maritime employment. To the extent permissible under the Constitution and the laws of the United States, this chapter shall apply to employees and employers engaged in interstate and foreign commerce and to employees in maritime employment and their employers not otherwise provided for by the laws of the United States. [L 1963, c 116, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง97-7; HRS ยง386-7] Case Notes Employment of all decedents, circumstances of death, and purpose of mission bore significant relationship to traditional maritime activity. 557 F. Supp. 1024 (1983).
